title: [CLIENT] Gifting center bugged
body:
Greetings!

My brother logged on to his account to send me some mystery skins and when he clicked the "Unlock a skin for a friend button"  absolutely nothing happened. You can spam click it as much as you like but it does not go towards the 3rd stage of selecting a skin. All the other options work (the snowball icon option worked as well as the "send a mystery gift")
I would be nice to have this resolved before Snowday Syndra {{champion:134}} goes off special (as that's what my brother and  I got the RP for!)

Steps on how to reproduce the bug:
1) Click on the store
2) Select Gifting Center 
3) Select the friend you wish to send a gift to
4) Press on the option that says "Unlock a skin for a friend" 

Expected result: You go to stage 3 where you choose what skin to send
Actual result: Nothing happens at all, no matter how long you wait
Frequency: 100% 

Thanks
